message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It offers exceptional value and benefits that align well with your needs. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you for $1800000. We believe this is a fair and competitive price given the market and the quality of our product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to $1400000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to make this opportunity more appealing, I am willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is now at $1600000. This price reflects a balance between our valuation of the product and your budget considerations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1500000 for your product.
